item.title: Brian add a quote by Oscar Gamble
item.description: "They don't think it be like it is, but it do." -- Oscar Gamble

item.title: Brian add a quote by Herman Melville
item.description: "There is a wisdom that is woe; but there is a woe that is madness. And there is a Catskill eagle in some souls that can alike dive down into the blackest gorges, and soar out of them again and become invisible in the sunny spaces. And even if he for ever flies within the gorge, that gorge is in the mountains; so that even in his lowest swoop the mountain eagle is still higher than other birds upon the plain, even though they soar. " -- Herman Melville

item.title: Brian add a quote by Eddie Izzard
item.description: "Father, bless me for I have sinned, I did an original sinâ€¦ I poked a badger with a spoon." -- Eddie Izzard

item.title: Brian add a quote by Eddie Izzard
item.description: "If there is a God, his plan is very similar to someone not having a plan." -- Eddie Izzard

item.title: Brian add a quote by Eddie Izzard
item.description: "We must have been hunters and gatherers but some of us were just waiters and hopers." -- Eddie Izzard
